name: cocoChanelJS
body:
### Welcome to cocoChanelJS.
Hey! I am a programmer, who once thought: _"What if we don't need to use Photoshop for websites design? Why all the tools that are for web-designers are built on a renderer that's simulating pages and not actually rendering them? Why tools like that need to cost a ton of money?"_

I found the solution: _"Hey, I am a programmer , why don't I take this flaw and transform it into an opportunity to make every web-desinger's life easier?"_ So I started to build this tool, it's easy to use, actively maintained (all on my free time), it's in HTML that builds HTML, no need **to install, just download open with your browser the file: "index.html" and voila!**

Try stuff out, for the moment there's no tutorial on how to use it but it's mostly straight forward:
***

1. Select your element.

2. Chose an action.

3. Voila!


**Please use Google Chrome (not yet tested in other browsers)**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
